propositions.text: The story revolves around a woman and a侠士 (侠士, a chivalrous warrior) defying family traditions for love.
The woman faces family opposition due to the侠士's low social status.
They elope, facing numerous challenges in the江湖 (江湖, the martial world).
Their journey includes encounters with danger and support from others.
They are attacked by bandits, saved by a hidden master (隐士).
They attempt to live in seclusion but are discovered by the family.
Separation and reunion define their later story.
The woman is forcibly taken back by her family; the侠士 disappears.
Years later, they reunite and decide to face dangers together.
Their love story becomes a legend in the江湖, symbolizing courage and perseverance.

concepts.name: 江湖 (Jianghu)
concepts.context: The martial world, a setting of freedom and danger where the story unfolds.

concepts.name: 侠士 (Xiashi)
concepts.context: A chivalrous warrior, the male protagonist embodying honor and love.

concepts.name: 家族 (Family)
concepts.context: Represents traditional authority and societal norms opposing personal choice.

concepts.name: 隐士 (Hidden Master)
concepts.context: A wise, reclusive figure offering guidance and aid.

concepts.name: 情 (Love/Emotion)
concepts.context: Central theme driving the protagonists' actions against adversity.

hierarchy.structure: The document is structured chronologically across five sections (four chapters and an epilogue), tracing the protagonists' journey from defiance to reunion.
